modules.description: The module enables configuring and customizing pie charts through a builder-pattern approach, modifying parameters like data content, canvas size, labels, tooltips, and visual effects using a `d3pie_settings` type. It leverages structured OCaml types to model chart properties, including color schemes, label formats, and callback mechanisms, facilitating dynamic visualization adjustments. This supports use cases such as generating interactive data displays or tailoring chart aesthetics for specific datasets.

Generates pie charts from structured data using D3.js rendering logic. Accepts lists of labeled numeric values and configuration parameters. Enables visualization of proportional data distributions in web-based reporting tools.

Configures and customizes pie charts using a builder pattern, with a focus on adjusting data, layout, and visual properties through a `d3pie_settings` type. It supports dynamic modifications such as setting color schemes, label formats, and tooltip behaviors, enabling tailored visualizations for diverse datasets. Operations include defining chart dimensions, formatting labels, and integrating interactive elements. Examples include generating responsive pie charts with custom color palettes or adding hover effects for enhanced user interaction.
